name: .DM_82 File Extension
summary: Learn about .DM_82 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Recording of a game played in Return to Castle Wolfenstein: Enemy Territory (v. 1.00), a 3D shooter; saves a complete recording of the gameplay that can be played back using the "Replays" option in Wolfenstein.

content: Later versions of Wolfenstein: Enemy Territory store recordings as .DM_83 and .DM_84 files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
